atk-abh03a64:1_0: 1. Idāni kusalādīsu dhammesu paccayadhammaṁ appaṭikkhipitvā paccayuppannassa kusalādibhāvapaṭikkhepavasena
atk-abh03a64:1_1: dhammānaṁ anulomapaccanīyatāya laddhanāmaṁ anulomapaccanīyapaṭṭhānaṁ dassetuṁ kusalaṁ
atk-abh03a64:1_2: dhammaṁ paṭicca na kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayātiādi āraddhaṁ. Tattha kusalaṁ
atk-abh03a64:1_3: dhammaṁ paṭiccāti kusalassa paccayabhāvaṁ anujānāti. Na kusalo dhammo uppajjatīti
atk-abh03a64:1_4: kusalasseva uppattiṁ vāreti. Tasmā ‘‘kusale khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpa’’ntiādinā
atk-abh03a64:1_5: nayena vissajjanaṁ dassitaṁ, taṁ sabbaṁ pāḷiṁ oloketvā sādhukaṁ sallakkhetabbaṁ.
atk-abh03a64:1_6: Yampi yena sadisaṁ, yañca yattha labbhati, yo ca yesaṁ vissajjanānaṁ yesu paccayesu
atk-abh03a64:1_7: gaṇanaparicchedo, so sabbo pāḷiyaṁ dassito, tasmā pāḷiyeva ettha attho. Yathā cettha,
atk-abh03a64:7_0: Aṭṭhakathāyaṁ vuttagāthāya dīpitā dhammānulomapaccanīyapaṭṭhāne cha nayā niddiṭṭhā
atk-abh03a64:7_1: honti. Paccayavasena panettha ekekasmiṁ paṭṭhāne anulomādayo cattāro cattāro nayāti
